step_feedback.feedback: While you attempted to tighten your muscles during inhalation, the measurements show inconsistent muscle engagement across different body parts. Try to engage all muscles more evenly, focusing on a whole-body contraction.
Hand placement on your abdomen is important for visualization. Ensure your hands remain still on your abdomen throughout the exercise to better track your breathing and visualize the fluid movement.

The visualization of fluid movement towards your chest during inhalation and outwards during exhalation is crucial.  Focus on this visualization technique to enhance the effectiveness of the exercise.
Remember to exhale slowly and completely, relaxing your muscles fully.  Inconsistent relaxation between repetitions suggests you may need to focus on the complete relaxation phase.

exercise_summary: You attempted the deep breathing exercise, but consistency in muscle engagement and visualization needs improvement. Focus on evenly tightening all muscles during inhalation and completely relaxing them during exhalation.  Visualize fluid movement to enhance lymphatic drainage.
